entry.def: A godfather is a male godparent.

entry.tran: 犯罪集团的头目；黑帮老大
entry.def: A powerful man who is at the head of a criminal organization is sometimes referred to as a godfather .

example.tran: 令人畏惧的黑手党头目

entry.def: You can refer to a man who started or developed something such as a style of music as the godfather of that thing.

example.tran: 灵乐的开创者詹姆斯· 布朗

means.word_mean: 1. any man who serves as a sponsor for a child at baptism
2. someone having a relation analogous to that of a male sponsor to his godchild

example.en: They made me the godfather of a whole generation of rebels.
example.zh: 他们推举我当叛逆一代的头领。

auth_sentence.content: Nick Serota is the fairy godfather of modern art.

auth_sentence.content: Not the godfather like Marlon Brando; the baby's godfather.

sentences.en: He really wants to fulfil his role as godfather properly.
sentences.cn: 他确实想好好履行作为教父的职责。
